items.reviewContent:
Well packed and no damages when received. Machine was tried to the limits, the features and power consumption are as described.
pros:
1. overall well assembled.
2. silent operation.
3. heavy duty.
4. automatic spinner, stops when lid opened, also doesn't rotate when empty.

cons:
1. back wall of washer drum looks very thin.
2. Lids are also prone to breaking if not closed gently.
3. filter grill is not properly installed/assembled.
4. knob markings can fade out fast.
5. the power lid is very short.

overall it should be the choice of every large family as compare to similar models of other brands.
